Game: Barbie as the Island Princess 2007-11-01T00:00:00-07:00 Barbie as the Island Princess is a video game of the Barbie franchise. This game is a collection of 28 different mini-games. Some of the mini-games are more frustrating to play than others due to the inconsistencies in the difficulty level. Barbie can unlock new locations by succeeding at the mini-games. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/680f7910-1b5c-48cb-a5e9-d1b80753856f.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/3b6075cc-de30-4d95-9351-8b4f3f4cb1de.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/241acdee-a2de-4883-8d73-7bfc91fadb5f.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/5c7308ea-02be-4c6a-a090-20fb83bd5c7d.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/467bfd94-8e5f-47c8-8e91-47207d85e264.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbie_as_the_Island_Princess_(video_game) Platform Activision
